import React, { useRef } from 'react' import { Card, Form, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import {useAuth} from '../contexts/AuthContext' function SignUp() { const emailRef = useRef(); const passwordRef = useRef(); const passwordConfirmationRef = useRef(); const { signup } = useAuth() function handleSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault() if (password) signup(emailRef.current.value, passwordRef.current.value) } return ( <>

) } export default SignUp
